mapper.select: select lb.lent_book_no as lentBookNo, b.title_info as title, lb.return_date as returnDate, lb.actual_return_date as actualReturnDate, b.image_url as imageUrl from tbl_lent_book lb join tbl_book b on lb.lent_call_no = b.call_no where lent_member_no = #{parameter} and (b.can_lend = 'L' or b.can_lend = 'R')
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_lent_book SET return_date = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(return_date, 'YY/MM/DD') + 7, 'YY/MM/DD'), can_renew = 'F' WHERE lent_book_no = #{lentBookNo} AND can_renew = 'T' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_book b WHERE b.call_no = ( SELECT lb.lent_call_no FROM tbl_lent_book lb WHERE lb.lent_book_no = #{lentBookNo} ) AND b.can_lend != 'R' )
